document.full_text: a merck & co drug that boosts the chance of curing hepatitis c infection moved closer to the u.s. market on wednesday as an advisory panel unanimously recommended approval.
document.title: us fda panel backs merck hepatitis drug
lines_and_colors: a merck & co drug that boosts the chance of curing hepatitis c infection moved closer to the u.s. market on wednesday as an advisory panel unanimously recommended approval.
